content: the perlina is a beautiful unique design that incorporates beads into your crocheted piece it is a bracelet in this pattern but you can make a piece that is as long or short as you like for a choker strap watchband etc this pattern is easily adaptable to a variety of items and can be easily modified with different yarn weights hooks and types of beads i give some ideas and suggestions in the notes at the beginning and at the end of the pattern the perlina is a very different type of crochet pattern **it is very important that you read through all of the notes before choosing your yarn beads and fasteners ** * hook size 3 5 mm and/or 3 mm depending on yarn weight 1 variances and personal preference * approximately 6 5 yards of yarn weight 1 * 4 mm beads * 8/0 seed beads * jewelry findings/connectors or 3/8 button with shank on back
